you could use NetarchiveSuite:
http://netarchive.dk/suite

Gives you an administrative interface for heritrix allowing you to schedule harvests and browse the harvested material afterwards as well as 
good statistics, distributable system (for large crawls and distributed storage)..

best
Bjarne Andersen
